predictions.text: Some activity on this website is tracked using tracking code (Google analytics) for optimization purposes (goal is to understand what users like to read and to thereby, God willing, improve the user experience).
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: Any information we have about you will never be sold or rented to others, God willing (i.e., it is for internal use).
predictions.description: This service does not sell your personal data

predictions.text: You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time
predictions.description: You can opt out of promotional communications

predictions.text: Have us delete any data we have about you
